divs: Sighting DetailsI was on my way home from my girlfriends aunts house when I noticed a bright like star in the sky. I looked for the north star to be sure it was not that and continued to keep my eye on the object. When I got home and kept an an eye on in with no other bright lights around I witnessed a aura of lights emincing from its self. I watched the object for almost an hour when a plane in the same distance was approaching the object but the object faded away when the plane came near. As the plane flew through the object reappeared and Im still watching it as I type this. I knew all of this to be real because my girlfiend was witnessing this whole event with me as well.
Summary: Bright object in sky at night no cloudcover flashing all different color lights hovering
trends: There has been one other sighting in Enfield
There were no other sightings in Enfield on or around January 15th 2012
